#!/bin/sh

PATH=$PATH:/home/app/.local/bin/
export PATH

if test -f /home/engines/templates/app/core_modules
   then
    cp /home/engines/templates/app/core_modules  /home/app/core_modules 
fi


if ! test -f /home/app/.have_profile
 then
  /home/engines/scripts/actionators/update_core_modules.sh
   mkdir /home/app/notebook
   cd /home/app/notebook
   ipython3 profile create nbserver
   jupyter notebook --generate-config

   touch /home/app/.have_profile

      if  test -f /home/app/.init_password
       then
        pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
        notebook_password=`cat /home/app/.init_password`
        passwd('$notebook_password')
        exit() " | ipython3  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 | sed "/.*sha1/s//\'sha1/"`
        cat ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py | sed "/^#c.NotebookApp.password .*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
        cp /tmp/confg ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py
        echo -n $pass > /home/app/DEBUGnotebook_password
        rm /home/app/.init_password
        echo -n $notebook_password > /home/app/DEBUGnotebook_password
     fi    
 else
  if test -f /home/app/.pass
   then
    pass=`cat /home/app/.pass`
  fi    
fi
 if ! test -z $pass
  then
    pass="--NotebookApp.password=$pass"
 fi    
 
PID_FILE=/tmp/ipython_notebook.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/system_functions.sh
host=`hostname`
ip=`grep $Hostname /etc/hosts |cut -f1 `
cd /home/app/notebook
#result=`jupyter-notebook   --ip=$ip $pass &`
result=`jupyter-notebook   --config ~/.ipython/jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py
pid=$!

echo $result

echo $result |grep token= > /tmp/first_run_url

echo $pid >$PID_FILE
startup_complete
wait
kill -HUP $pid
shutdown_complete

exit

#!/bin/sh
/home/app/.local/bin/pip3.7 install --upgrade  $module --user
 if test $? -eq 0
 then
    echo  $module > /home/app/user_modules
 else
  echo "Failed to install $module "
 fi

#!/bin/sh

  pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
  passwd('$notebook_password')
  exit() " | ipython3  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 | sed "/.*sha/s//\'sha/"`
  cat ~/.ipython/jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
  cp /tmp/confg ~/.ipython/jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py
  echo -n $pass > /home/app/.pass
  echo -n $notebook_password > /home/app/.notebook_password

#!/bin/sh

PATH=$PATH:/home/app/.local/bin/
export PATH


pip3 install --upgrade pip --user
python3.7 -m pip install --upgrade pip 

if test -f /home/app/core_modules
 then
   for module in `cat /home/app/core_modules`
    do
     echo Updating $module 
      python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade  $module --user
    done
fi

#!/bin/sh

PATH=$PATH:/home/app/.local/bin/
export PATH


  
     if test -f /home/app/user_modules
      then
       for module in `cat /home/app/user_modules`
        do
         echo Updating $module 
          python3.7 -m pip  install --upgrade  $module --user
        done
     fi

#!/bin/sh

PATH=$PATH:/home/app/.local/bin/
export PATH


  
     if test -f /home/app/user_modules
      then
       cat /home/app/user_modules
     else
      echo 'No modules'
     fi

#!/bin/sh 
 
 if test -f /home/app/user_modules
      then
      cat  /home/app/user_modules | grep -v "$module" >  /home/app/user_modules.new
      python3.7 -m pip  uninstall   $module --user
       if test $? -eq 0
       then
        mv /home/app/user_modules.new /home/app/user_modules 
      else
       echo failed to remove $module
      fi
    else
     echo no User Modules
 fi
